text:
Diesel eager to work with Deepika

Hollywood action star Vin Diesel will share the screen with Deepika Padukone in the upcoming XXX: The Return of Xander Cage and he says he always wanted to work with the Bollywood beauty.

Deepika was almost cast in Diesel’s Furious 7 but things did not materialise. Diesel has now revealed that he is excited to finally get an opportunity to collaborate with the Bajirao Mastani star.

“You have heard some of the casting, you have heard about Deepika, who is somebody I have wanted to work with for a long time...we are going to have a blast,” Diesel said.

“I have been dying to work with someone from Bollywood and bridge that gap, and I think there is something very multi-cultural about that, and very exciting. I think she is going to be just such a delight. I think the world is going crazy over her character,” he added. — PTI
title: ENT-DIESEL
